title: mac OS Sierra
body: i want to update my mac to os sierra but i dont know if it will work with league so my question is does league work on macOS Sierra ?

replies.body: Yeah, this OS is supported!  You shouldn't run into issues, but we're here to help out if you do!
Can you guys do something about the game crashing on High Sierra? I crash every single game after updating

Hey there, I haven't heard of this happening.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can dig into this with you directly, and see if there might be something going on.  See you there!
